name: Conntour
headline: Monitor & search security camera footage with natural language.
description:
Conntour lets governments and corporates query their security cameras. Users can search past footage (“Find a man with a blue backpack”), set alerts (“Alert me if someone climbs over the wall”), and extract data (“How many vehicles entered yesterday?”).

We recently secured our first paying customer - the Singapore government - paying $80K for a 3-month trial. If successful, this trial will lead to a contract worth ~$2M/year.

Matan (CEO) led a military video surveillance unit, leveraging security cameras to save lives. Tomer (CTO) is a second-time founder and former director of engineering.

The problem with existing solutions is that they offer low customization, as they’re limited to pre-defined parameters (like shirt color or license plate number). This lack of flexibility causes missed critical events, too many false alarms, and countless hours wasted on manual footage review. Conntour solves this by offering unlimited flexibility through natural language queries - just ask anything.

founders.name: Matan Goldner, Co-Founder & CEO
founders.description:
I’m the co-founder and CEO of Conntour.

I led a military video surveillance unit - leveraging security cameras to save lives. Later I managed surveillance at a private security company, working with most of the existing video analytics solutions.

In those roles, I used many of the solutions that are now our competitors and experienced a major need that had no real solution. That experience also helped me build strong connections with global leaders in the physical security industry.

founders.name: Tomer Kulla, Co-Founder & CTO
founders.description:
Co-Founder and CTO at Conntour, with a BSc in Computer Science focused on computer vision. 
Previously, I founded and sold Nilus, where I worked on eCommerce ad-tech and recommendation engines (ML). 
My career spans both hands-on experience—particularly in web, MLOps, and big data—and leadership roles, including managing teams and as a Director of Engineering manging goup of 3 teams.

# Meet your ultimate video surveillance operator.Powered by AI.
Conntour monitors and searches video footage using your text descriptions.
No pre-defined parameters, no limits.
[Book a demo](https://www.conntour.com/<#contact>)[See it in action](https://www.conntour.com/<#>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/676eb12923bef4db1ef0bfb5/679b7bdb7282e0a9ae1fd47f_blue-ground.png)
### Before
Limited pre-defined parameters
![A table of input drop-downs showing Person and Vehicle attributes.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/676eb12923bef4db1ef0bfb5/677cc83249bcbb38edac71c0_Hero%20Before%2001.png)
### With Conntour
Describe exactly what you need
## Trusted by:
## Limited analytic tools hurt your security
The world is complex and dynamic. Pre-defined parameters like shirt color or license plate number are simply not enough
### You are missing critical events
Limited analysis capabilities prevent you from setting tailored alerts, allowing security issues to slip by
### False alarms cause alert fatigue
If you can't be specific enough about what's important to you, you'll get false alarms until you ignore them
### Watching hours of video wastes time and money
Analysts sitting and watching videos wastes time and money that can be better spent elsewhere
![img](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/676eb12923bef4db1ef0bfb5/6771f039abdfe66195fd44fd_Img%20\(5\).webp)
Real-Time Alerts
## Never miss an event again. Forget false alarms.
Our AI scans your footage 24/7/365. The flexible free-text search makes sure there are no false alarms.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/676eb12923bef4db1ef0bfb5/67877f391ff1df189e3f4a27_Conntour%20Alerts%20V5.png)
## Never miss a critical moment. Forget false alarms.
Our AI monitors live video streams in real time, guided by your specific instructions
## Find exactly what you’re looking for. Fast.
Investigate days of video footage in minutes
[See it in action](https://www.conntour.com/<#>)
![An event reading: "Find a person leaving with a large package from the main entrance", accompanied by an image of the detection: a person with a box leaving the building.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/676eb12923bef4db1ef0bfb5/677cc8320b349067af974d5a_Feature%202%20-%2001.png)
## Get a video surveillance operator that never sleeps and never misses
Book a demo to see how we can help bring your security operations into the AI age
[Book a demo](https://www.conntour.com/<#contact>)
# Everything you need to maximize security
Conntour is designed to transform your security operations without
disrupting your workflows
### Integrates to your existing systems
No need to change your hardware, tools or processes
### Attach images to improve detection
Add images to your customized rules or searches
![Conntour's logo connected with an NVR/DVR on one side, and VMS on the other.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/676eb12923bef4db1ef0bfb5/677cc8327398212f9800203b_Integration%2001.png)
### Clean, professional reports
Receive reports with video highlights, footage links, and more
### Deploy anywhere
Whether in the cloud or on-premises, Conntour is environment-agnostic
![Conntour's logo connected with a Cloud icon on one side, and On-Prem icon on the other.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/676eb12923bef4db1ef0bfb5/677cc8326f40baf3214a08d6_Conntour%20Deployment%2001.png)
### Control users and permissions
Define who gets to see what
### Get notified anywhere
Email, messaging apps, push notifications and more
![A list of employees with various custom permission sets.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/676eb12923bef4db1ef0bfb5/677cc83249bcbb38edac71d6_Permissions%2001.png)
![A list of notifications in various applications: Gmail, Telegram, Microsoft Teams and iMessage.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/676eb12923bef4db1ef0bfb5/677cc86163e1c1efc2251134_Alerts%2001.png)
## Improve security. Save time.
Some of the results we’ve achieved so far:
## -0%
### Missed events
Compared to traditional analytics
## -0%
### False alarms
Compared to traditional analytics
## -0%
### Time spent
On manual footage reviews
## Built by security experts
Conntour was founded by Israeli military and security veterans with deep expertise in physical security. Our experience revealed the limitations of current video analytics, inspiring us to transform how security professionals interact with video footage

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Conntour**

Founded in 2024 and based in Tel Aviv-Yafo, Israel, Conntour is on a mission to revolutionize video surveillance. What sets them apart? They allow users to **monitor and search security camera footage using natural language**. Imagine asking your security system, “Find a man with a blue backpack,” or “Alert me if someone climbs over the wall.” That’s the flexibility and power that Conntour brings to the table.

### The Problem

Traditional video analytics solutions tend to be rigid, relying on pre-defined parameters like shirt colors or license plate numbers. This rigidity leads to missed critical events, an overload of false alarms, and the merciless drudgery of manual footage review. In a world that is complex and dynamic, these limitations are simply not enough.

### The Solution

Conntour's innovative approach leverages advanced AI to offer **unlimited flexibility through natural language queries**. They allow users to engage with their surveillance data in a more intuitive and efficient way. The AI operates around the clock, scanning live video streams based on user-defined queries, ensuring no critical moment slips through the cracks. 

### Recent Milestone

Exciting news for the company: they recently secured their first paying customer—the Singapore government—who has signed on for a trial worth **$80,000 for three months**. If this trial goes well, it could lead to a substantial contract valued at around **$2 million per year**. 

### The Team

Conntour's team is led by **Matan**, the CEO who has military experience in video surveillance, and **Tomer**, the CTO, a second-time founder and former director of engineering. Their combined expertise in security and technology clearly informs Conntour's innovative model.

### Future Prospects

With a growing roster of features designed to improve security operations and reduce the time spent on manual footage reviews, Conntour is well-positioned to lead the charge in a market begging for disruption. They integrate seamlessly with existing systems so organizations don’t need to overhaul their hardware or software to benefit from their technology.

### Tags and Affiliations

Conntour identifies within the segments of **govtech**, **computer vision**, **B2B**, **security**, and **AI**—showing a broad applicability of their platform. Additionally, they are part of Y Combinator's **W25** batch, which speaks volumes about their potential and credibility.

For more information, you can explore their website at [Conntour.com](https://www.conntour.com/) where you can also book a demo to see their solution in action. 

**Conclusion**

In a world where security is paramount, Conntour stands out by merging cutting-edge technology with usability, redefining how organizations can interact with their surveillance systems. Expect them to be a key player in the evolution of security solutions as they continue to capture attention and grow their footprint in the industry.
